name: Talking to Your Doctor
description: Guides for respectful, productive conversations during clinical visits.

name: Primary Care
description: Intake and follow-up prompts for family medicine and general practice visits.

name: Insurance & Billing
description: Plain-language tools for navigating statements and coverage steps.

name: Medication Management
description: Questions that help review dosages, schedules, and side effects safely.

name: Chronic Conditions
description: Support for long-term condition monitoring and care plan check-ins.

name: Symptom Tracking
description: Prompts for logging symptoms and spotting patterns to share with clinicians.

name: Mental Health
description: Conversation starters for therapy sessions and emotional wellbeing check-ins.

name: Recovery Support
description: Guidance for post-procedure recovery discussions and pain management.

name: Pediatrics
description: Caregiver prompts for pediatric symptoms and follow-up questions.

name: Lifestyle Support
description: Lifestyle and habit prompts that complement medical recommendations.

name: Diagnostics Prep
description: Templates for preparing questions about imaging, labs, or upcoming tests.
